messages.subject: Co-housing with like minded people
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I am hoping to find other single moms like my self to cohouse. As you probalby know or imagine being a single parent can be challenging, but
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone,
I am hoping to find other single moms like my self to cohouse. As you
probalby know or imagine being a single parent can be challenging, but
single, working, and unschooling is even more challenging. I'm sure
there are other single moms out there in the same situation and I would
love to find YOU. I am interested in cohousing with like minded people
for genuine mutual support and friendship. I live in the San Diego area
and would love to hear from others even if not in SD.


I am a 34 year old single mother of a 5 year old boy. I am looking for
other single moms (at least one other single mom) with similar
interests to co-house with for genuine mutual support and friendship
for ourselves and our children. I currently live in San Diego CA, but I
am looking forward to relocating to Ithaca. My son and I are very easy
going people. My son is very sociable, thoughtful, baby lover, funny,
curious, and very charismatic. We follow a healthy diet, mostly whole
foods including dairy and white meat. I prefer having no TV or at least
no commercial TV, I am simple in every way, low tech, I am a clean,
organized, not religious but spiritual, I love cooking and time to
share with my son and friends.
These are some interest that I would love to share in our home:
Homeschooling/Unschooling
Social and environmental issues- always learning and willing
Whole foods
